node.display_long_description:
ENHANCED FOR QUEST 2
New super resolution offering the sharpest picture with more detail than ever!

SWAT DLC NOW LIVE!
Featuring an all new subway scenario with dozens of new events to master as well as 10 fully interactive SWAT-issue weapons

SANDBOX NOW LIVE!
No limits, no rules; just grab any gun and start blowing stuff up.

STRIKING REALISM
Highly detailed & fully interactive weapon models. Developed on real-world ballistics, you can handle, load, cock & fire these weapons. Flick off the safety, select burst or full auto, extend the stock or rack the slide to clear a round

UPGRADE & CUSTOMISE
Unlock hundreds of attachments and upgrades for your weapons. The picatinny rail system allows for limitless customisation. Stocks and scopes, extended mags & laser sights: customise your weapons to fit any scenario

PROGRESSION
Earn cash & rankings based on your performance to progress. Hundreds of events including hostage rescue & sniper scenarios to the zombie apocalypse

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
1.1.82.30c SWAT DLC BugFix Patch 2
- Loading Screen Issue Fix for those effected

1.1.82.29c SWAT DLC BugFix Patch 1
- Resolves issues with Subway events
- lots of minor issues resolved
- Added Cloud Data support for transferring progress between devices

------------------------------------
Main Release Notes 1.1.82.16

SWAT DLC puts you to the test as you master the weapons and tactics needed to become the best of the best. Hone your skills in the intense combat training simulations, face off against waves of hostile targets, and survive the onslaught of the apocalyptic zombie horde. 

Featuring an all new subway scenario with dozens of new events to master as well as 10 meticulously detailed and fully interactive SWAT-issue weapons:

M1014 (Shotgun)
Spas 12 (Shotgun)
M16A2 & M16A4 (Assault Rifle)
Scar-H (Assault Rifle)
USP 45 (Pistol)
FiveSeven (Pistol)
MP7A1 (SMG)
Uzi Pro (SMG)
MP5A2 (SMG)

This update also includes literal game changing addition
 - Freeform Locomotion: Move around all ranges with our new movement modes, dodge enemy fire and take more strategic positions and explore the ranges. Enable the movement option in the GamePlay Settings.

nodes.title: SWAT DLC out now!
nodes.body_text:
SWAT DLC puts you to the test as you master the weapons and tactics needed to become the best of the best. Hone your skills in the intense combat training simulations, face off against waves of hostile targets, and survive the onslaught of the apocalyptic zombie horde.



Featuring an all new subway scenario with dozens of new events to master as well as 10 meticulously detailed and fully interactive SWAT-issue weapons including:

M1014 (Shotgun)
Spas 12 (Shotgun)
M16A2 & M16A4 (Assault Rifle)
Scar-H (Assault Rifle)
USP 45 (Pistol)
FiveSeven (Pistol)
MP7 (SMG)
Uzi Pro (SMG)
MP5A2 (SMG)



We've also upped the stakes with some intense new gameplay modes:

SURVIVAL pits you against a seemingly endless stream of opponents, all while managing very limited ammo supplies

WAVE DEFENCE sends increasing hordes of enemies at your position with only brief gaps between the action to restock and reload

RESCUE sees you navigate deadly firefights while avoiding the many civilian targets in the area.



SWAT DLC is available now!

node.reviewDescription:
I bought this in a whim thinking it looks kind of fun, and really like it more than expected. For me, when I'm short on time, I like that each range session or moment of game play is a short stint so that I can quickly shoot around and then get back to real life. Because of this I probably have played this game more than anything other. I keep getting drawn to it. It's very active target practice and just fun.

 It's not too hard to level up and it's a good challenge too. The level of difficulty can change depending on your gun of choice for that level and how upgraded your weapon is (easier with upgraded guns and ammo). At first it's a bit difficult to manually do things with your gun like reload or click on things but you get used to it with your hands physically being in controllers doing what hands do virtually. 

Use the "sandbox" to plan out what guns you wish to buy and modification you would upgrade on you gun. Then when you earn money get those items strategically you really want because once you buy a gun or parts you can not sell it back that I know of.

website_page_meta.description: Now enhanced for Quest 2! Take to the range with an arsenal of the world’s most powerful weaponry in Gun Club VR. Addictive game play and unsurpassed realism combine to make Gun Club VR the ultimate virtual weapon simulator. The only thing missing is the smell of the gunpowder.
website_page_meta.title: Gun Club VR · Oculus Quest
